member.name: M:RPGCore.Data.Polymorphic.Inline.SerializeBaseTypeAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Indicates that the type this attribute is placed on should be considered a base-type with automatically resolved sub-types.

list.item: As no explicit sub-type is provided; the sub-types for this base-type will be resolved automatically.
As no naming convention is provided; all sub-types name will be resolved using .
As no alias conventions are provided; all sub-types aliases will be resolved using .

As no alias conventions are provided; all sub-types aliases will be resolved using .

member.param: The naming convention used to source the name for resolved sub-types.

member.name: T:RPGCore.Data.Polymorphic.PolymorphicOptionsBuilder
member.summary: Options used to configure polymorphic serialization.

member.name: P:RPGCore.Data.Polymorphic.PolymorphicOptionsBuilder.DescriminatorName
member.summary:
Determines the name of the property that is used to determine polymorphic types.
The default value for this property is "$type".

member.name: P:RPGCore.Data.Polymorphic.PolymorphicOptionsBuilder.CaseInsensitive
member.summary:
Determines whether type names should be case-insensitive.
The default value for this property is true.

member.name: P:RPGCore.Data.Polymorphic.PolymorphicOptionsBuilder.DefaultNamingConvention
member.summary:
Determines the default type name to use when none is supplied.
This property by default uses an instance of .
